messages.content: Thank you for calling Danone customer service. My name is Fred. May I know who I am speaking with today?
Hello Ursula, nice to meet you. How can I assist you today?
I'm really disappointed with your Activia product. I've been a loyal customer for years, but the quality just isn't the same anymore. I'm seriously considering switching to another brand.
I'm really sorry to hear that you're disappointed, Ursula. Could you please tell me more about the issues you've been experiencing with Activia?
The taste and texture have changed, and it just doesn’t feel like the same product I used to love. I'm not sure what's happened, but I'm not happy with it.
I understand your concerns, Ursula. We value your feedback and want to make things right. Have you recently purchased a particular batch or flavor that seemed off?
Yes, the strawberry flavor. I bought a few packs last week and they all tasted strange.

Thank you for providing that information, Ursula. I'll report this to our quality control team to investigate further. In the meantime, we would like to offer you a refund or replacement for the packs you purchased. Would that be acceptable?
A refund would be nice, but I'm still not sure if I want to continue with Activia after this experience.
I completely understand, Ursula. We sincerely hope you’ll give us another chance. I'll process your refund immediately. Is there anything else you’d like to discuss or any other concerns you have?
No, that’s all for now. Thank you, Fred.
You're welcome, Ursula. Again, I apologize for the inconvenience, and we hope to serve you better in the future. Have a great day!
